name: Dungeon Game (arifimran)
description:
WASD - Move

Front Attack: Attacks an enemy in front of you.

Range Attack: Attacks an enemy 3 tiles away from you.

Area Attack: Attacks all enemies within a same room.

Round Attack: Attacks all enemies surrounding you.

The objective of the game is to find a treasure chest. You must fend off all enemies as you search for the treasure chest.
